articles.description: Justice is served
articles.content: Last month, we ran a story about a new exploit ruining competitive play in Pokémon Sword and Shield on the Nintendo Switch. It became such a "well-known bug" one video on Twitter demonstrating this nasty trick was viewed more than 50,000 times before it was r… [+1051 chars]

articles.title: Peter Weller Returns as RoboCop for Mortal Kombat 11: Aftermath - Den of Geek US
articles.description: Dead or alive...but probably dead...you're coming with him. RoboCop will now be a playable character in Mortal Kombat 11.
articles.content:
Ill buy that for a dollar! Or forty of them, since that’s the going price for the upgrade.
Whats especially sweet about this is that they got Peter Weller to voice the character! Im already way too excited to get to see Weller-voiced RoboCop banter with Keit… [+1102 chars]

articles.description: Plus, why you should consider joining the Public Beta Program right now rather than waiting for this release.
articles.content:
iOS 13.5 Public Beta 3
Anthony Karcz
Welcome to this week's Public Beta release! Technically, it's iOS 13.5 Public Beta 3. But really it's iOS 13.4.5 Public Beta 4.

articles.author: David Freezer
articles.title: Sam Byram reveals 'main worry' for Norwich City players amid Project Restart discussions | Norwich City News - PinkUn
articles.description: Norwich City defender Sam Byram says players are waiting for firm guidance on football’s potential return as anxiously as supporters - but remain worried about how a restart is possible amid the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content:
Norwich City defender Sam Byram, right, holds off the challenge of Wolves winger Adama Traore at Carrow Road earlier this season Picture: Paul Chesterton/Focus Images
Paul Chesterton

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 will let you customise yer bum, according to ESRB rating - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: According to its official "mature" rating with the ESRB, Cyberpunk 2077 will let you customise your rear and all your other bits too.
articles.content: Cyberpunk 2077‘s now officially gotten stamped with a “Mature” rating by the ESRB, one of the organisations wot gives all the big games their official warning labels. Most of the ESRB’s description of Cyberpunk’s activities is pretty expected—nothing that GTA… [+2410 chars]

articles.title: Kiwi Car Thieves Stage a Real-Life Gone in 60 Seconds - GTPlanet
articles.content:
A gang of car thieves in New Zealand have staged a brazen car heist of a barely believable magnitude. Apparently working in teams, the crew made off with almost 100 vehicles over the course of a long weekend.
